backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, habits, records, monthly targets, lifetime totals, and authorization-gated CRUD APIs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new format by adding monthlyTargets and lifetimeTotal maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style definitions using OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, profile loading, and routing to login, setup, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: A collapsible UI panel that toggles visibility of the HabitManager component for adding and managing habits.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches render errors and displays a custom fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fallback UI for fatal errors showing an error message with options to reload or retry.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Renders a calendar-style grid of habits, allowing toggling completion and editing numeric or time-based amounts. Uses records to map daily completion state and updates via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI to create, edit, and delete habits, including weekly targets, units, and default amounts. Validates inputs and updates habits through mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays app header with user info, view-mode switching, report export, theme toggle, and logout. Integrates dropdown and icon controls for navigation.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Shows an investment goal with progress, and supports editing, deleting, and adding contributions via dialogs. Uses mutation hooks to update or remove goals.
Lists investment goals and provides a form to create new ones. Handles input validation and interacts with backend via query and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays login screen for Internet Identity authentication with branding and a login button. Shows loading state during login attempts.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: UI for viewing and editing monthly habit targets, including auto-plan defaults and saving changes via mutation.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Provides horizontally scrollable month tabs allowing selection of a month. Uses tab components to trigger month changes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form allowing users to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly and lifetime habit progress visualizations with charts and progress stats.
frontend/src/components/ReportExportDial: Dialog for exporting habit data to CSV with date range selection and optional habit filtering.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard combining habit management, targets, tracking grid, and progress charts with month navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity persistence handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, habits, and related habit data through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining theme colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Placeholder TypeScript declaration file for jsPDF types.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses freeâ€‘text duration strings into seconds, formats seconds to readable strings, and validates duration input.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames based on date ranges for CSV or PDF downloads.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Helpers for converting, labeling, creating, and identifying habit unit types.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Builds CSV export content from habit data and triggers CSV file download.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to UTC components and formatting UTC dates.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder for PDF report generation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Computes report statistics including habit performance, daily stats, and volume metrics over a date range.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing a habit-tracking app with monthly targets, auto-progression defaults, lifetime totals, existing features, and pending backend feature requests.
